document_data.name: Kossaandar
document_data.mainbody: '''Kossaandar''' was a [[shadowslain]] [[Blackscale]] [[lizardfolk]] fighter and warchief of the [[Shadowscale]] tribe in the [[Shadow Swamp]] in the [[Plane of Shadow]] in the early 1370s [[DR]].
document_data.History:
Kossaandar was formerly of the Blackscale tribe in the [[Vast Swamp]] before being taken and made into a Shadowscale. He became a loyal follower of [[Ketsarra Shadowscale]] and served as her warchief.

In early [[Eleint]] of the [[1374|Year of Lightning Storms, 1374 DR]], adventurers in service to [[Mystra]] presumably destroyed Kossaandar as they dealt with the Shadowscales and their [[Shar]]ran allies. After his defeat, the remaining Shadowscales scattered across the Shadow Swamp, a tribe no more.
document_data.Activities: In Ketsarra's absence, Kossaandar led the Shadowscales at their [[Shadowscale Warren|warren]] in the Shadow Swamp. He held court from the so-called Great Warren and dwelled in the chief's den with its riches. He was advised by the [[banelar]] [[Isti-Zar]], who'd been sent to the warren by [[Despayr]].
document_data.Description: Being a Blackscale, Kossaandar was a hulking great lizard-man as big as an [[ogre]] and powerfully muscled. As a shadowslain, shadows clung about his torso and limbs.
document_data.Powers: Kossaandar had the powers of a Blackscale and of a shadowslain undead and was a powerful master of the [[greatsword]].
document_data.Personality: Kossaandar was fierce and utterly loyal to Ketsarra.
document_data.Possessions: Kossaandar wielded a ''+1 greatsword'', wore a [[breastplate]], and carried five [[javelin]]s.
